short_summary: Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement
description: Temporary Help Services Requirement for Department of National Defence
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Temporary Help Services for National Capital Region

## Official Solicitation Number:
 S4669373

## Issue Date: 
September 28, 2023

## Closing Date:
October 12, 2023 (11:30:00 AM EST)

## Solicitation Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking temporary help services through a Request for Proposal (RFP) issued under Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870. This requirement is open to holders of the aforementioned SA who qualified under the following stream and category: Stream 7 – Miscellaneous engineering/technology services, Category 7.1 – Engineer, aerospace.

## Tender Overview
The successful bidder will provide temporary help services to support the Department of National Defence in the National Capital Region. The requirement involves the provision of engineering services by an aerospace engineer.

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity
* National Capital Region (NCR)

## Security Requirements
The resources to be provided must be at a minimum of Secret Clearance level.

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is looking for temporary help services to support a variety of tasks.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at:

* Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 971-7955
* Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H 8G1

## Documents
The tender document is available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20896/s4669373---dp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20896/s4669373---dp.pdf)
